content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in my hot tub on the decking at 9.30 pm.  it was dark.  the sky was fairly clear with strips of low cloud with clear sky showing stars in between.  i saw two points of light in the distance directly south which looked like an aeroplane coming directly towards us, but we see planes on the flight path to london gatwick from the east and sometimes from west if they circle but not from the south usually.  i moved to the edge of the hot tub to get clear of the steam to get a better look and in a couple of seconds the two points of light changed to two strips of light.  only about half a centimetre or less each but with a small gap in between and then as abruptly disappeared.  i thought that they would reappear from behind the cloud as there was only light cloud cover but saw nothing more in any direction.  i wondered if i had seen a plan side on with the window lights showing but it made no sense to have turned from head on to side on and be close enough to see window lights that quickly and there was no sound of a plane at all.  this only lasted a couple of seconds in total and made no sense at all to me.  never seen anything like it before.
content.summary: Two points of light stretched quickly to two oblongs of light and then disappeared without changing direction

content.detailedDescription: I was in meditation in an attempt to invite extra-terrestrial beings while in my meditation i heard small footsteps and almost like a tap on the fence which was about 6 or 7 feet away from me accompanied with a very deep breathing that was a bit different from what humans typically make even when attempting to breath a bit deeper. a swoosh of air went over me i could barely feel that is when i heard the breath one last time and at the end of the breath i heard my motion activated night vision camera go off. the camera was about 5 feet away or so. this camera will only go off on its own when an object is within 20 feet or less with the settings i had on. it is in three round burst mode which is why the first three are within seconds of eachother. the fourth picture is the orb a little closer and for the fifth i edited and put a selective focus on the features at the top of the orb. opinions on what you see are welcome even if you see nothing! it may appear to some it could be a celestial orb however, i disagree simply due to the fact when a celestial being appears the face or certain features appears to be inside the orb. i personally have not seen anything like this before though so maybe i have something misconstrued within our spirits as human beings.
content.summary: I believe to have caught an e.T. you be the judge!

content.detailedDescription:
At around 20:00 uk time, monday 12th october 2015, as i stood at my door and was gazing at the beautiful dark sky and visible bright stars, an extremely bright light caught my eye, high in the eastern sky, so i looked in that direction to see if what flashed would flash again.

i can only describe the flash like a very slow camera like flash, which dimmed slowly.
the light flashed again slowly, and dimmed slowly.
then as i watched in awe, it flashed again, and again and then the light moved slowly to the right of where i had first seen it. (if i had been holding a ruler at arm's length, it would have moved around 4-5 inches to the right)...And then it seemed to "fizzle" out.

i was totally amazed at what i was watching!.....And then i noticed a satellite running through roughly where the event took place,...I often see the satellites go overhead, and i always watch out for them, and yes, i know they can glow bright when they catch the light from the sun, but this was not a satellite!

as i stood and watched the area where the light had "fizzled" to darkness, my eyes were then drawn to my left,low in the eastern sky to another bright flash! but this was just one slow flash.......And then using my analogy of the arm's length ruler, i would say the next flash happened about 12 inches or more to the right, again in the lower easter sky.

i have no idea what i witnessed, but it was not a meteor, a plane, a helicopter, a firework, a chinese lantern or anything of that nature....The flashes of brilliant white light were very definite,and the slow dimming was also quite definite.

i had to rush out to work, and could not stay to see if there was any more activity, but this morning when i returned home, i went on line to see if anything had been reported to the armagh observatory, but alas it had not.

i hope someone can please tell me what i witnessed last night, but i am sure someone else's eye was drawn to the bright flashes in the beautifully dark, autumn, cloudless sky.
i also hope that somewhere, an observatory has recorded what i saw, because although i have a mobile/cell phone, i am not sure how to take video, and even with that, it was up stairs and i was literally rooted to the spot in case something else happened.

i couldn't wait to tell someone about what i had witnessed, so thank you for giving me the chance to give in detail what i saw.
it was an exciting event, but with a tinge of creepiness!
content.summary: Extremely bright light, which dimmed slowly and then lit up again and moved.

content.detailedDescription:
120ct2015: identifed 4 distict crop circles (2 large; 1 med; 1 small in diamond formation)  in field just outide of tree line from home on hill; walk dogs in the area daily and was not there a week ago; took pictures and called mufon.

130ct2015: awoke 0130hrs to strange pulsating noises and as though something was outside of my second story window; looked out and noticed a bright light coming from the area where i observed crop circles. noticed object on ground level and was scanning with white light; had multiple lights emitting, disco ball like and varied in depth very bright lights; pulsating lights and glitter; pulsating continued. documented my observations on iphone 6 plus as i describe what i saw in action.

there were 4 objects total observed; 2 space station star-like hovering in the sky due west and sw bouncing and communicating with lights and pulses.

woke up my parents and my mom drove with me as she recorded with my phone in the car as we went to the main road to view the opposite side of the field/tree line where we observed light casting  off of the trees in the woods. noticed the larger craft in the sky very clear above us; bright white bulbs at the top and bottom; vertical/inverted diamond with blueish white, yellow and gold shimmer, pulses and stobes. no aircraft were in the immediate area at this time of night! ruled out the lights were coming from neighbors porch from the excessive bright lights coming from these objects.

went back to house, ran inside started recording what i was seeing; fear started to kick in as this was going on for a good hour now. called 911 and enforcement laughed at the situation i described and said there was nothing they could do! about 15 mins later, state police arrived; two young male cadets joined me with flashlights and guns as we walked to the edge of the field where the lights where coming from; once out past the tree line in the open field, they noticed the space station in the distance due sw and in an instant, the light in the trees disappeared in an instant. another state patrol car was set on the main road due sw about 500 yards away.

i directed the pennsylvania york county state officers to the crop circles and they took pictures and said they could not explain what was happening here as they were not trained for this in at the academy. walked back to the property and gave them my information

the next day, i went to take more pictures and was very reluctant to touch anything due to the high growth of grass surrounding the circles, organic metallic sparkle like reside; bent blades of grass, holes, burned and charred grass which had an oder.

standing by to take samples as directed as i feel radiation may be present. 

all pictures came directly from my iphone 6 plus and have not been modified or alterd.
content.summary: 3rd attempt trying to upload, please see description below

content.detailedDescription:
120ct2015: identifed 4 distict crop circles (2 large; 1 med; 1 small in diamond formation)  in field just outide of tree line from home on hill; walk dogs in the area daily and was not there a week ago; took pictures and called mufon.

130ct2015: awoke 0130hrs to strange pulsating noises and as though something was outside of my second story window; looked out and noticed a bright light coming from the area where i observed crop circles. noticed object on ground level and was scanning with white light; had multiple lights emitting, disco ball like and varied in depth very bright lights; pulsating lights and glitter; pulsating continued. documented my observations on iphone 6 plus as i describe what i saw in action.

there were 4 objects total observed; 2 space station star-like hovering in the sky due west and sw bouncing and communicating with lights and pulses.

woke up my parents and my mom drove with me as she recorded with my phone in the car as we went to the main road to view the opposite side of the field/tree line where we observed light casting  off of the trees in the woods. noticed the larger craft in the sky very clear above us; bright white bulbs at the top and bottom; vertical/inverted diamond with blueish white, yellow and gold shimmer, pulses and stobes. no aircraft were in the immediate area at this time of night! ruled out the lights were coming from neighbors porch from the excessive bright lights coming from these objects.

went back to house, ran inside started recording what i was seeing; fear started to kick in as this was going on for a good hour now. called 911 and enforcement laughed at the situation i described and said there was nothing they could do! about 15 mins later, state police arrived; two young male cadets joined me with flashlights and guns as we walked to the edge of the field where the lights where coming from; once out past the tree line in the open field, they noticed the space station in the distance due sw and in an instant, the light in the trees disappeared in an instant. another state patrol car was set on the main road due sw about 500 yards away.

i directed the pennsylvania york county state officers to the crop circles and they took pictures and said they could not explain what was happening here as they were not trained for this in at the academy. walked back to the property and gave them my information. one of the officers directed me to contact mufon.

content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Disco ball with pulsating light on ground with survey scan lights pulsated; 2 larger aircrafts in sky cylinder double cone top to bottom  resembled space station starlike with flashing lights/strobes

content.detailedDescription: Before school, i was on the bus and as we were picking someone up, i glanced out the window and noticed the odd formation of lights. at first, i assumed they were stars. on closer inspection, i abruptly changed my mind. stars do not usually form such a pattern or appear that close to earth. the three lights were very bright and emitted an orange-yellowish light. another reason why is dismissed my star theory was that stars are not typically so low in the sky. the three lights remained there for maybe 5 minutes and then i pulled my phone out to snap a picture and when i looked up, they were no longer there. it was still dark outside and i thought maybe i was being silly and perhaps they were just odd stars. i pulled out my phone's compass and noted that the lights were coming from the west. i tried to find the lights again for another 30 minutes but i could not find them. this led to my conclusion that i saw some kind of ufo.
content.summary: Three lights in a triangular formation remained motionless and then disappeared

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were leaving bodega bay.  we were right in the middle of bodega bay and sonoma and we observed a red glowing globe in the night sky.  it appeared to be either 2 or 3 miles away in the night sky headed west, we were headed east.  the object seemed to be emitting a flame.  it seemed to ascend further into the night sky and make a slight curve as it ascended.  we were going to pull over, but we had cars behind us on a narrow road, we were headed for vallejo/sacramento.
content.summary: Red glowing globe emitting flames

content.detailedDescription: I am followed by mass dark tinted windowed cars from nevada, california and washington trying to get away from this nightmare. i have 7 months of info, i cant sit still long enough to type everything. they are trying to microwave me with this thing that looks like a glow/cloud/stingray and as they do that, what ever they put in me grows and is moving. please help me. i dont want to die this way
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: This has been going on every day for 7 months. i saw things, i dont think they thought i could. they have been scanning, vibrating, burning me. thought i had been chipped but i now think they put an alien in me. please help. they are after me

content.detailedDescription: On 10/12/2015 i observed 4 lights traveling from north to south along the florida coast from my location in port st lucie, this is the second time i have witnessed unusual lights in the same general location traveling in the same direction in just the last week . unlike the previous lights which appeared as orbs, these lights looked like stars, except that there was no wavering in them , they did not blink or flash or twinkle, they were steady.They moved in formation 3 lights forming a triangle and a 4th light following behind at slightly greater distance giving them the appearance of a stingray, i believe that there is some serious u.F.O activity on the coast now, and i will be going down to the beach with camera in hand to attempt to video these events, as should you , my point and shoot camera will probably let me down .
content.summary: 4 lights moving from north to south

content.detailedDescription: My two friends and i went out on the balcony of our dorm to shine laser pointers at people, but one of my friends noticed a light flying around. it was about a mile away flying above a neighborhood. we watched it's erratic path for a while and then i decided to record it. i tried to film it once, but it disappeared for a few minutes. then i tried to film again and while filming the light returned and i caught it on tape. that's what's in my video. shortly after the video, the light dissappeared and never came back.
content.summary: Saw a strange light orb flying around and filmed it

content.detailedDescription: My son and i driving down hwy 100 saw light thru treetops then saw triangle object in clear view, 3 white lights at corners outline illuminated like florescent tube body light blue almost translucent appearance. it slowly banked and traveled out of site. tree tops blocked my view. we both clearly saw this.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: My son and i driving down hwy 100 saw light thru treetops then saw triangle object in clear view, 3 white lights at corners outline illuminated like florescent tube body light blue almost translucent appearance. it banked slowly and recruited out of saw t

content.detailedDescription: I was painting a house for a guy. the house had a good view of a vally. after painting i took three pictures of the sunset i noticed a orb in one it was the third i took it was not in the other two photos. i didn't see it until days later when i looked at my photos. i took it using my samsung galaxy 6 phone. no adjustment. i sent all three photos. but only one has an orb.  up and left of the sun.
content.summary: Took three photos in a row of the sunset. the third, i noticed later had a orb. i didn't see it taking the photos

content.detailedDescription:
Estaba sentado mirando al cerro uritorco y de repente aparece una luz que se acercaba hacia mi posiciã³n a una velocidad lenta. me quede observã¡ndolo (no es la primera vez que observo a naves y tengo gran historial de experiencia de campo) y tranquilamente fui a agarrar la videocamara y lo filme, cosa que no hice en mis experiencias anteriores.
venia en linea horizontal a muy poca altura de mi punto. me quede observã¡ndolo muy tranquilo, y pensando en si esta vez agarro la videocamara o no. paso por arriba de mi casa y ya lo perdi de vista
content.summary: Nave camuflada

content.detailedDescription: I'm a mentally stable person first off. the time and date above was entered because it is a required field, however, i have no idea when this occurred.  it was approximately 2 years or so ago that i noticed the circle in my lawn when mowing in the spring.  i live on 40 acres in the woods and the property is not visible from the road.  i have thought about obtaining soil samples but decided not to because everyone thinks i'm just nuts - not literally, but they don't really think it's anything.  my husband said the ground is just contaminated and i told him, yes it is, and contaminated in what seems to be a perfect circle.  the edges of the circle seem like the grass is trying to grow back, but it sure is taking a long time and it's an "eye sore".  there have been no spills or accidents of any kind on our property, as we take good care of the property and are environmentally respectful and safe. this circle is really starting to bug me, but i am more bugged by the fact that family/friends just laugh it off.  i have lived on this property since 95 and don't recall, nor does my husband, anything ever happening to cause this.  the only thing i can think of, and it's only my imagination according to family/friends is one drizzly/foggy evening in winter a few years back i heard something strange.  i was on my back deck smoking a cig and heard what sounded like a low flying aircraft/loud humming sound.  it was dark so i could not see anything, nor did i.  only problem with what i heard was the sound was first heard as abruptly as it stopped.  fog, rain, weather, traffic from the main road, can be deceiving out here in the woods when it comes to sounds, so i dismissed it after that evening, although it really bugged me that evening as i sat and thought about what i had just heard, or lack of what i heard. anyway, the dang circle is still there, and the longer it remains there, the more i am convinced that it's not normal or from here.  i wish someone with an open mind would just come and look at it and test my soil.  the dogs won't even go potty in that area.
content.summary: Medium sz circle on property where grass is gone & not growing back

content.detailedDescription:
Went out to out deck..I was looking up to review the night sky.  as i am looking i notice this tiny light miles above it started moving ene.  and covering a huge distance.  it banked left, did a 180 and zoom backed to its original spot.  i kept looking and it reappeared and went ene again with some zig zag in its path and it traveled a longer distance..It did another 180 and zoomed back to where it started then disappeared.   this was miles above...Just a little dot in space.  will be looking more!!!!!
was gonna try and record it but it was so high up i didn't think my phone would capture it. if i see it again i will try asndf record it
content.summary: Light flying miles above.  very high.  only saw it by chance

content.detailedDescription:
It was about 10pm, i had stepped out for a smoke and was looking up at the stars as it was a clear night.

i noticed a bright flash in the sky and turned to face that direction (west) expecting to catch a glimpse of a flaring satellite. there was a second flash (a flare less than a second in duration) a few seconds later but as it faded i couldn't make out the object that might have caused it.

a third flash provided a direction moving upwards in the sky towards vega roughly and i followed the trajectory line to see if i could catch what was causing it.  by doing so i caught sight of a very dim red light, but as i observed it it did not move in a straight line as a satellite would, but instead slowly turned in random directions.

the object flared or flashed a few more times before i lost sight of it completely and there were no more flashes.  to me it looked like an aircraft manoeuvring at a very high altitude and flaring as it reflected the sun.  the pale red colour of the light reminds me of the report i put in on september 06, but observed from different locations (about 20 miles apart)
content.summary: Periodic bright flashes by dull red light moving randomly in the western sky

content.detailedDescription: My roommate was watching the blood moon and eclipse , he came quickly to tell me run outdoors to see "this weird cloud" what i saw was this huge v shape cloud it looked low to me, and it was lite up inside, well a dim glow, however it lite up the cloud hard to write down what i saw.. i saw the face at the bottom and i ran inside he took the picture on cell phone. i do not live in los angles i live in hacienda hts. he was fixed on looking at it, however i was moved to run inside, and i can still see it as if i just saw it, if you know what i mean. you can use this picture i send in however i do not want my name or the person who took the picture known. thanks
content.summary: Very large v shape cloud formation with face at bottom

content.detailedDescription: I first noticed a bright flash out of the corner of my eye. i looked over and observed something hovering and randomly pulsating and flashing a white and blueish  white light. the hair on the back of my neck instantly stood up and i felt uneasy. sometimes it was a dim light, dimmer than most of the stars, other times it was brighter than any star in the sky, sometimes it stayed bright for a few seconds before dimming out. it slowly started moving south and then shortly after it stopped blinking. i watched it for 10 minutes. i witnessed this exact same event over shoshone, id on october 8 2015 with my girlfriend and my nephew. we all experienced the same feeling of uneasiness when we observed that one, too. tonight in paul i was alone, outside getting air and looking at the stars before bed. this just happened not 30 minutes ago from writing this report. i attempted to take video on my phone, but there was no way i could have picked it up. i tried!
content.summary: Randomly pulsating and blinking orb with different intensities

content.detailedDescription: At about 11:40pm i was walking at the end of my apartment building facing west when i saw a bright star like object. it was pulsing red yellow orange green. it was above building 1 in my apartment complex. it stayed there for at least a min then just vanished. i remember feeling a butterfly like feeling in my stomach and feeling afraid.
content.summary: Witnessed a bright color changing light then it vanished

content.detailedDescription: I tried to let the dog out at just about 11:00, maybe a minute or two before that. she didn't go out so i stood on the porch and looked at the sky. i saw a bright flash like a meteor for just a millisecond. no trail, just like a star flared and then went out. i then saw another dimmer light blink on just about ten seconds later due south of where of i saw the first flash but still fairly close to the first location. it resembled a satellite light except it disappeared and blinked off.  i looked a little south of where it blinked on and then off(  blinked on once each time) and again i saw a light appear and then blink off and disappear. it seemed to go on in about ten second intervals. i saw it again blink on and then off. just one light blinking on and then off each time, then an interval where there was nothing and i had to guess where it might be judging by its direction and the fairly slow speed it seemed to be. it had the light emission and speed of a satellite as you track it across the sky, it just blinked on and then off about every ten seconds or a little longer. that made it hard to follow. it was almost clear with clouds only in the southern sky and not overhead.
content.summary: Light blinked on and off and then would appear again a short distance away

content.detailedDescription: I know i just happened to look up at the top of the pine trees  there was something  big and bright. knew it was to big to be a star cause it was to close. so i started taking pictures with my iphone and zoomed it in and this is what i got. within an hour it was farther up in the sky
content.summary: Big and bright

content.detailedDescription: Could not sleep.Went out to smoke .I thought it was a star so i took a picture with my ipad .I went in side got dressed came out again it was still in the same spot.At 5:30 i took my son to work and it was gone.I watched it for at least 20 min before getting dressed. i was on the back porch with the dog .It was so bright so close i thought it might be the space station.When i returned to my son it was gone
content.summary: Hovered

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting outside around the campfire with my husband when we started seeing these bright orbs up high in the sky. they were up much higher that airplanes or jets fly. 
at first i thought they were stars, until we noticed not only were they moving they would go very bright and then almost disappear completely, but continuing to move. it do not travel in a straight line it would deviate , a little to the left and then a little to the right.They moved ata variety of heights. travelling in groups of 4-5. there was also smaller ones that would dart around the larger ones.  we saw close to 100 of these orbs fly over the night skies, going west by north westerly direction. we watched them in the night sky for close to 30 minutes. i had to confirm with my husband that i really was seeing what i was seeing. my husband did confirm that to me.
content.summary: Moving objects western sky

content.detailedDescription: I just take a few pictures of the sky because the clouds was red then when i'm at home checking the pictures i see this object like a bright orb i send the pictures to my brother and my mother and they se the same thing that bright orb in the clouds
content.summary: I take a few pictures of the sky then when i see them again i see the object

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving east on 18 approaching the old kent narrows draw bridge when i noticed the lights in the sky. sort of freaked me out at first because i thought it was a 747 or such from bwi trying to make a landing attempted on the bridge. 2 white lights next to each other in the center and faint red at the ends of the wings. as i got closer the craft appeared to be stationary which i thought was weird for an aircraft of the size it appeared to be. i turned under the overpass to the park and ride to see if i could get some pictures but couldn't see it so jumped over to the fishermans in crab deck parking and noticed it had disappeared. i drive a prius and was on battery with the windows cracked and there was absolutely no noise. if this was a jet or other aircraft i would have expected to hear the engine noise at least. talked to the workers at the crab deck and they saw it as well but they looked away and it was gone. 

the craft appeared to be 150 feet at least from tip to tip and wings came out of the base a little bit then swept up on a 30 degree angle. brief glimpse i got of the shadow. fairly dark other then the 4 lights. aviator for 10 years in the army and the was the first time i have ever seen anything like this.
content.summary: Vehicle hovering just east of the kent narrows bridge, grasonville md

content.detailedDescription: i was lying in my bed watching tv when i looked out the window i noticed and bright lights about 1 mile away i again to watch television again i kept looking out of the window and it seemed the object was not moving i went and got my daughter and we both went outside it was moving across the sky very very slow i went back in and got my binoculars when i looked through them i could see to flames underneath what looked to be the shape of a black rockets as i look down to step over some rocks my daughter said that it disappeared in front of her eyes i looked up and the object was gone the object when it was moving was on a 45 degree angle with the flames at the same angle.We went back in the house and was not really sure on what we had the song i watch it for close to 20 minutes my daughter watch it for maybe 10
content.summary: 2 flames under a black object

content.detailedDescription: At a park near reeds lake a little after 8 pm. noticed a triangle of three "stars" about 70 degrees up in the south east sky. the "stars" suddenly changed brightness and the lower two moved quickly toward the tree line. i continued to see the objects moving about the sky for around ten minutes. i also observed two planes in the distance. the "star" objects moved much faster in the sky than the planes.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Star-like objects moving at various speeds and paths

content.detailedDescription: My best friend & i always went out to the desert to show people the lights in the desert. no one ever could say for sure what they were. they usually appeared in sets of 3. sometimes only 1 or 2 in a different color. weve seen some ascend but usually the will appear & reappear some where close by. we could sit there for hours watching them move. i brought a scope one time but could never say what it was. maybe a government base in the mountains by the hoover dam?
content.summary: Light in the desert

content.detailedDescription: On our way to lincoln, ne my sister in law,eight year old niece, and i witnessed a meteor skid across the sky after approximately 2-3 minutes later we saw a huge white light with a greenish hue to it fall directly to the ground northeast in the distance.
content.summary: White light with greenish hue crashing straight to ground

content.detailedDescription:
On way home from school

random turning of the head

a flat cloud

a craft(shaped like a cigar from my pov), cloud color, remained stationary for 5 seconds, then diagonally up-right, then diagonally down-right(without raising/diving the nose), then it was gone

i was scared and shocked

it vanished

the enclosed image is the closest match to what i saw, just  with more detail. the image is from california.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Craziest thing i ever saw
